Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Yakinana imana vali'am ne dovam sasaram vica safalata prapata kiti hai
jihare apani namaza la'i jhukana vale hana
Ate jihare phalatu galam tom bacade hana
Ate zakata ada karana vale hana
Ate jihare apane gupata agam di rakhi'a karana vale hana
Binham apani'am patani'am de ate unham auratam de jihari'am unham di malaki'ata vica hona ki unham nala saga karana vica ko'i mara nahim
Ham jihare unham tom binham horam de ichuka hana ate iha hadam tapana vale hana
Ate jihare apani'am amanatam ate ikararam da dhi'ana rakhana vale hana
Ate jihare apani'am namazam di rakhi'a karade hane
Tam uha hi loka varisa hona vale hana, jihare savaraga di virasata pa'unage
Uha usa vica hamesam rahinage
Ate asim manukha nu miti de tata tom paida kita hai
Phira asim pani di ika buda de rupa vica usa nu ika surakhi'ata tikane vica rakhi'a

Phira asim pani di ika buda tom ika bharuna da rupa dita, phira bharuna nu masa da ika lokara bana'i'a, phira lothare de adara hadi'am paida kiti'am. Phira asim hadi'am ute masa carha dita. Phira asim usa nu ika navem rupa vica kharha kita. Tam uha alaha vadi'am barakatam vala ate ati utama sirajanahara hai
Phira isa tom magarom tusim zarura marana hai
Phira tusim ki'amata de dina jida kite ja'uge
Phira asim tuhade la'i sata raha bana'e ate asim khalakata tom bekhabara nahim ho'e
Ate asim asamana tom ika niyata tarike nala pani varasa'i'a. Phira asim usa nu dharati vica roka dita. Ate asim usa nu vapisa laina de vi samaratha ham
Phira asim usa vicom tuhade la'i khajura ate agura de baga paida kite. Tuhade la'i unham vica bahuta sare fala hana ate tusim unham vicom' khande ho
Ate asim uha rukha paida kita jihara sina pahara tom nikalada hai, uha tela lai ke ugada hai ate khana vali'am la'i salana vi
Ate tuhade la'i janavaram vica sikhi'a hai. Asim tuhanu unham de peta vicom cizam (dudha) pila'unde ham. Ate tuhade la'i unham de anekam labha hana ate tusim unham nu khande ho
Ate tusim unham upara ate kisati'am upara savari karade ho
Ate asim nuha nu usa di kauma vala bheji'a tam usa ne akhi'a hai meri kauma! Tusim alaha di badagi karo. Usa tom' binham tuhada ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Ki tusi darade nahim

tam usa di kauma de saradara, jihare inakari sana. Unham ne akhi'a iha tam basa tuhade varaga ika adami hai. Uha cahuda hai ki tuhade upara apana prabhava jama lave. Ate jekara alaha cahuda tam uha farisate bhejada. Asim iha gala apane pichale vaderi'am tom nahim suni
Iha tam basa ika bada hai jisa te pagalapana savara hai â€œtam basa ika samem taka isa di udika karo
Nuha ne akhi'a he mere palanahara! Tu meri madada kara ki'unki inham ne mainu jhuthala dita hai

Tam asim unham nu ika vahi bheji ki tusim sade sahamane ika kisati ti'ara karo sade maraga darasana de anusara. Ate jadom sada hukama a jave ate dharati da pani ubala pave tam hareka kisama de janavaram vicom ika-ika jora lai ke usa (kisati) vica savara ho javo. Ate apane ghara vali'am nu vi sil'ham unham de jinham de sabadha vica pahilam faisala ho zuki'a hai (nala lai lavo? Ate jinham ne zulama kita hai unham de mamale vica mere nala gala na karom. Besaka unham ne dabana hai)
Phira jadom tusim ate tuhade sathi kisati vica baitha jana tam akho ki siphata hai alaha di jisa ne sanu zalima lokam tom baca'i'a
Ate akhom ki hai mere palanahara! Tu mainu barakata vali tham upara utara ate tu sabha tom vadhi'a utarana vala hai
Besaka isa vica nisani'am hana ate besaka asim badi'am da imatihana lainde ham
Phira asim usa tom magarom duja samuha paida kita
Phira unham vicom' him ika rasula unham kola bheji'a ki tusim alaha di ibadata karo usa tom binham tuhada ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Ki tusim darade nahim

ate usa di kauma de saradaram ne jinham ne inakara kita ate praloka di mulakata nu buthala'i'a asim unham nu sasarika jivana vica khusahali bakhasisa kiti si. Unham ne kiha ki iha tam sade varaga hi ika bada hai uhi khanda hai jihara tusim khande ho ate uha hi pinda hai jihara tusim pinde ho
Ate jekara tusim apane varage hi ika bade di gala mani tam tusim vade ghate vica rahaunge
Ki iha bada tuhanu kahida hai ki jadom' tusi mara ja'uge ate miti ate hadi'am ho javoge tam phira tusi' kabaram vicom kadhe ja'unge
